bug-1653076-pref-amazon-top-sites-tile-s.userFacingName: Amazon Top Sites tile study- US V3
bug-1653076-pref-amazon-top-sites-tile-s.userFacingDescription:
This experiment covers two questions:

1) Does the search attribution flow break if we change the target the Amazon tile from prefilling the URLBar with '@amazon ' to a URL?
2) Are users more likely to use the Amazon top site as a direct link and how does that impact partnership revenue?
